item.title: Trailblazer Alumna Award
item.description:
2021 Trailblazer Alumna Award
 
This award is specifically designed to honor an alumna who graduated within the years 2000-2016. We understand several of our amazing alums are leading in their careers or doing outstanding work as entrepreneurs.
 
Lauren Babb '10

item.title: MOSAIC Magazine
item.description:
A MOSAIC is an array of diverse elements joined together to create a greater whole.

The MOSAIC Mercy High School Magazine is published twice yearly for alumnae, parents, supporters, and friends. If you have news to share, please send to alumnaeoffice@mhsmi.org.
item.dc:creator: Brainwrap

item.title: 2021 Reunion
item.description: CELEBRATING 76 YEARS OF MERCY HIGH SCHOOL
item.dc:creator: Brainwrap

item.title: Alumnae
item.description:
Once a Mercy Girl, Always a Mercy Girl

If you graduated from Mercy, you are automatically a member of the Mercy High School Alumnae Association – 16,000 alumnae strong! No matter where your interests lie, we invite you home to Mercy.

Follow us on Facebook and Connect on LinkedIn!
item.dc:creator: Brainwrap

item.title: Clone of Tea for Tuition 2007
item.description:
What a "TEA-riffic" afternoon for MERCY

On Sunday, April 29th 225 women gathered at the 3rd Annual Tea for Tuition.  The Mercy gym was filled with 33 brightly decorated tables of Mercy women sipping tea and enjoying gourmet sandwiches and sweets.
item.dc:creator: Mercy High School

item.title: Tea for Tuition 2006
item.description:
Nearly $5,000 was raised for the Alumnae Association Tuition Assistance Fund to provide 10 scholarships to deserving Mercy students.

On April 30, 2006 over 200 women enjoyed a lovely afternoon of tea and catching up with friends. Table hostesses created beautifully decorated tables for their guests transforming the Mercy gym into a tea parlor.
item.dc:creator: Mercy High School

item.title: 70th Anniversary & Grand Reunion Weekend
item.description:
THANK YOU to everyone in the Mercy community who attended and helped make the Mercy High School 70th Anniversary & Grand Reunion held September 24 - 28, 2015 a wonderful celebration!

Class Photo Gallery

Observer & Eccentric Newspaper Photo Gallery

item.title: Distinguished Alumna
item.description:
2021 Mercy High School Distinguished Alumna
 
Patricia Petrella Nouhan, M.D. ‘81

Patricia Petrella Nouhan, M.D. ‘81 exemplifies the Mercy values in her job as a physician, her role as residency director, her volunteer work and in her personal life.

item.title: Alumnae Book Club
item.description:
ALUMNAE BOOK CLUB

Share your love of literature and connect with other Mercy women by joining our Alumnae Book Club! To receive notice of book club happenings, send an email to Tina Cyrol Russette '76 at tmrussette@att.net.

2021
